data.text: @vsingh570 Viyom, passengers with a single name on his/her passport will not be accepted To and From UAE until they change their passports as per the requirement (Reference ICAO Document 9303 on Machine Readable Travel Document, Ed 18,2021). 1/2
@vsingh570 Viyom, we shall get back to you once we have an update. Your patience shall be appreciated.

data.text: @ParthGoel5 Hi Parth, kindly note that SpiceJet follows a dynamic pricing structure whereby the fares vary as per the seat availability per flight. We only have a certain number of seats available for a specific price, and once those are purchased, the next available fare is released
